info.title: Ordinals API
info.description: A service that indexes Bitcoin Ordinals data and exposes it via REST API endpoints.

get.description: Displays the status of the API
Retrieves a list of inscriptions with options to filter and sort results

parameters.name: from_sat_ordinal
parameters.description: Ordinal number that uniquely identifies a satoshi

parameters.name: to_sat_ordinal
parameters.description: Ordinal number that uniquely identifies a satoshi

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: An UTXO for a Bitcoin transaction

items.title: MIME Type
items.description: MIME type for an inscription content

items.title: Rarity
items.description: Rarity of a single satoshi according to Ordinal Theory

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Whether or not the inscription is recursive

parameters.name: cursed
parameters.description: Whether or not the inscription is cursed

get.description: Retrieves a list of inscription transfers that ocurred at a specific Bitcoin block
Retrieves the contents of a single inscription
Retrieves all transfers for a single inscription
Retrieves ordinal information for a single satoshi

parameters.name: ordinal
parameters.description: Ordinal number that uniquely identifies a satoshi

get.description: Retrieves all inscriptions associated with a single satoshi

parameters.name: ordinal
parameters.description: Ordinal number that uniquely identifies a satoshi

get.description: Retrieves statistics on the number of inscriptions revealed per block
Retrieves information for a BRC-20 token including supply and holders
Retrieves a list of holders and their balances for a BRC-20 token
Retrieves BRC-20 token balances for a Bitcoin address

items.title: Operation
items.description: BRC-20 token operation. Note that a BRC-20 transfer is a two step process `transfer` (creating the inscription, which makes funds transferrable) and `transfer_send` (sending the inscription to a recipient, which moves the funds)

tags.name: Satoshis
tags.description: Endpoints to query Satoshi ordinal and rarity information

tags.name: BRC-20
tags.description: Endpoints to query BRC-20 token balances and events

tags.name: Statistics
tags.description: Endpoints to query statistics on ordinal inscription data
